button.pay.description: Button text for paying an order. Must translate to Serbian as 'Plati'.

button.continuePay.description: Button text for continuing to pay an order. Must translate to Serbian as 'Nastavi plaćanje'.

button.checkDetail.description: Button text for checking order details. Must translate to Serbian as 'Pogledaj detalje'.

button.query.description: Button text for querying an order. Must translate to Serbian as 'Pretraga'.

button.finish.description: Button text for manually finishing an order. Must translate to Serbian as 'Završi ručno'.

button.update.description: Button text for updating an order. Must translate to Serbian as 'Ažuriranje'.

field.id.description: The ID of the order. Must translate to Serbian as 'Broj narudžbine'.

field.amount.description: The amount of credits for the order. Must translate to Serbian as 'Iznos'.

field.price.description: The price of the order. Must translate to Serbian as 'Cena'.

field.description.description: The description of the order. Must translate to Serbian as 'Opis narudžbine'.

field.state.description: The state of the order. Must translate to Serbian as 'Stanje'.

field.createdAt.description: The creation date of the order. Must translate to Serbian as 'Datum kreiranja'.

field.service.description: The name of the service. Must translate to Serbian as 'Naziv usluge'.

field.payWay.description: The payment method for the order. Must translate to Serbian as 'Način plaćanja'.

field.api.description: API is an online service. Must translate to Serbian as 'API'.

field.proxy.description: Proxy is an online service used for data transmission as an HTTP proxy. Must translate to Serbian as 'Proxy'.

message.paidSuccessfully.description: Message for successful payment. Must translate to Serbian as 'Plaćanje uspešno'.

message.orderExpired.message: Narudžbina je istekla. Kreirajte novu narudžbinu za plaćanje.
message.orderExpired.description: Message for expired order. Must translate to Serbian as 'Narudžbina je istekla. Kreirajte novu narudžbinu za plaćanje.'.

message.createFailed.description: Message for failed creation. Must translate to Serbian as 'Kreiranje nije uspelo'.

message.wechatPayHelp.message: Molimo otvorite WeChat na svom mobilnom uređaju i skenirajte kod za završetak plaćanja.
message.wechatPayHelp.description: Message for WeChat pay help. Must translate to Serbian as 'Molimo otvorite WeChat na svom mobilnom uređaju i skenirajte kod za završetak plaćanja.'.

message.free.description: Message for free order. Must translate to Serbian as 'Besplatno'.

message.buyInExternalUrl.message: Molimo završite plaćanje na spoljnom linku.
message.buyInExternalUrl.description: Message for buying in external URL. Must translate to Serbian as 'Molimo završite plaćanje na spoljnom linku.'.

message.updateFailed.description: Message for failed update. Must translate to Serbian as 'Ažuriranje nije uspelo'.

message.updateSuccessfully.description: Message for successful update. Must translate to Serbian as 'Ažuriranje uspešno'.

message.confirmFinish.message: Ova radnja ručno postavlja narudžbinu na status plaćanja i završava rukovanje. Ne može se poništiti. Molimo potvrdite da je klijent završio plaćanje. Da li želite da nastavite?
message.confirmFinish.description: Message for confirming finish. Must translate to Serbian as 'Ova radnja ručno postavlja narudžbinu na status plaćanja i završava rukovanje. Ne može se poništiti. Molimo potvrdite da je klijent završio plaćanje. Da li želite da nastavite?'.

state.pending.description: State of the order indicating that the order is still awaiting payment from the user. Must translate to Serbian as 'Na čekanju'.

state.paid.description: State of the order indicating that the order has been paid for. Must translate to Serbian as 'Plaćeno'.

state.expired.description: State of the order indicating that the order has expired. Must translate to Serbian as 'Isteklo vreme plaćanja'.

state.failed.description: State of the order indicating that the order payment has failed. Must translate to Serbian as 'Neuspelo plaćanje'.

title.info.description: Title used as website title indicating order information. Must translate to Serbian as 'Informacije o narudžbini'.

title.wechatPay.description: Title used as website title indicating WeChat pay. Must translate to Serbian as 'WeChat plaćanje'.

title.aliPay.description: Title used as website title indicating AliPay. AliPay is an online payment method. Must translate to Serbian as 'AliPay plaćanje, AliPay je način plaćanja putem interneta'.

title.stripe.description: Title used as website title indicating Stripe pay. Stripe pay is an online payment method. Must translate to Serbian as 'Stripe plaćanje, Stripe je način plaćanja putem interneta'.

title.manageOrder.description: Title used as website title indicating order management. Must translate to Serbian as 'Upravljanje narudžbinom'.
